abstract: Los Angeles police officers Sgt Eric Gonzalez and Deputy Sussie Ayala are found guilty of violating constitutional rights and falsification of records in 2011 beating of jail visitor Gabriel Carrillo.
lead_paragraph: Two Los Angeles County sheriff’s deputies and a sergeant were found guilty Wednesday in the back-room beating of a jail visitor who, other guards testified, was already handcuffed on the ground and covered in blood.

headline.main: California: 3 Officers Convicted of Beating Jail Visitor
headline.print_headline: California: 3 Officers Convicted of Beating Jail Visitor
